actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Employment Opportunities.

official_title: To amend the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967 to clearly express the fact that appointed judges are protected under such Act.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Amends the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967 to specify that appointed judges are not included in an exemption from the definition of "employee" as used in that Act.

titles.title: To amend the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967 to clearly express the fact that appointed judges are protected under such Act.
